website_summaries.verdict: This decanter wins on volume and price. One of the only wine aerators we considered that holds more than one bottle, this thick glass Culinaire carafe has a 60.8 ounce capacity, allowing it to comfortably hold two 750 milliliter bottles of wine (or more) at a time, making it ideal for parties and gatherings where you want to aerate a larger amount. Attached glass handle makes for easy pouring.
pros: Larger size is ideal for bigger bottles of wine or for entertaining
Side handle can make pouring much easier
cons: No warranty information is listed at all, which is risky for a glass item you have shipped
Some users report the handle makes the carafe vulnerable to early cracking

customer_reviews.title: Glass has cracked where handle attaches after 5 uses.
customer_reviews.text: This is visually a nice piece. It doesn't drip too much upon pouring, but you do have to be careful. I only owned this for 5 months, and probably used it about 5 times. After the last use, I noticed hairline cracks where the top of the handle attaches. Consequently, it is now unusable. I was extremely careful, always hand washing and drying. (It is very tedious trying to dry out the inside.) I'm extremely disappointed to have it fail after so few uses and therefore cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Deal and Easy Way to Class Up your Liquor Cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this decanter used for $10.53, and couldn't be happier! It was shipped well padded and in good condition, and it looks great sitting on my glassware cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: but it was sad to see there was a crack under the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what I wanted and will work, but it was sad to see there was a crack under the handle when I unrapped it!
customer_reviews.author: Tamrin Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Handle
customer_reviews.text: Decanter is good, but don't get the one with the handle. Arrived cracked at the joint, but not "broken".
customer_reviews.author: Richmond Kid

customer_reviews.title: unreliable, easy braking,  waste of money ...
customer_reviews.text: it arrived already cracked above the handle... very disappointing I was was waiting for it to arrive for 2 months!!! I now I can't even use it... I read the comments that it had broken for couple people after just couple times at exact same place...
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one as a gift, and now have given the second away... buying a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Great value and clean s up well in the dishwasher. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C.

customer_reviews.title: Great decanter!
customer_reviews.text: Great decanter my first with an handle and I really like it. Arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Photocop2011

customer_reviews.title: No good 😠
customer_reviews.text: Broke with in two weeks is not very strong enough
customer_reviews.author: ORZIC JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safe and sound and I really like how it pours without dribbling wine all over the table cloth...
customer_reviews.author: jan houser

customer_reviews.title: Item broken
customer_reviews.text: Item was a birthday gift just opened and it is broken at the handle. Please replace!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Florian

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well packaged on delivery. Will easily fit one 1.5 litre bottle. Easy to poor, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful item
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. This is a lovely item and it served its purpose beautifully. We truly appreciate it and will enjoy it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. It looks nice for the price, but a crack appeared near the handle after he washed it for the FIRST TIME. He hand washed it in hot water, I guess he should have used cold, but didn't know any better. The temperature was enough to crack the glass. The crack started out small then it traveled up the neck and became so noticeable and large that we felt it was unsafe to use and threw it away. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Liz O'

customer_reviews.title: Red wine server
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wine server! It holds approximately 3 bottles of wine for serving so don't have to fill up very often. Got so many compliments at Thanksgiving. Beautiful, graceful shaping and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Glass chipped upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived chipped but the chip was so small we decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a great value. Mine arrived in perfect condition. The handle makes pouring so much easier after decanting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decanter at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice decanter! Ordered as a gift and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Tip me over, and pour me out?
customer_reviews.text: We've always meant to buy a decanter, but so many look delicate and weirdly shaped. I figured one of us might spill it. This is a beautiful shape and its functional. Love the handle. If form and function are in harmony, that's a good thing, right?
customer_reviews.author: S.A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Very thin glass, not the elegant piece I expected. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: SusanNC

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: U.
